creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
This enhancements adds an XML Schema to define the new XML namespace
(http://logging.apache.org/) that is, at this, time only supported by the Joran
configurator.

The current files are added to the CVS to start the effort:

src/schema/logging.xsd
tests/src/java/org/apache/log4j/xml/SchemaTestCase.java
tests/input/schema/valid/*.xml and tests/input/schema/invalid/*.xml

The initial commit only reflects those elements present in the XML configuration
files used in the unit tests.  Future modifications will add missing elements
and support for foreign namespaces.

Initial effort stalled and had been hanging around in the log4j 1.3 build for
too long in an experimental state.  Removal from log4j SVN HEAD completed with
rev 372048.

Created strictxml sandbox project to work on an XML syntax that could be
enforced by XML schema-aware editors.  The project was seeded from the files
removed from log4j SVN HEAD, but expect the final schemas to be substantially
different.  Did not place strictxml in the log4j branch of the sandbox since the
intent is to write a configuration schema that will support log4j, log4cxx, et al.
creator: carnold@apache.org
